title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Reflective Learning to Improve Nurses' Observation and Decision-Making Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can improve fixation rates by over 30% when making judgments about observational items after reflective writing in VR simulation environments
Learners can accurately identify at least two patient environmental issues without visual cues during verbal reflection activities

Learners compare the effectiveness of two reflection methods in software development (Agile retrospective vs. traditional post-mortem analysis) across three metrics (time efficiency, problem-solving accuracy, team satisfaction), and select ≥1 suitable reflection strategy based on learning style diagnostic results (reflective/adaptive/experimental), providing application examples
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
